glsa.title: libxml2: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in libxml2 allows a remote attacker to cause Denial of Service.

background.p: libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project.

description.p: libxml2 returns the empty string when the allocation limit is encountered while constructing the attribute value string.

impact.p: A remote attacker may be able to cause Denial of Service via a specially crafted XML file.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libxml2 users should upgrade to the latest version:
